text: cycles. The descent of the Sphere from the Andromeda Galaxy would take 2,000 years. Not only was the Earth grid unprepared to house its energies, but the timing of entry would be completely out of syn- chronization with Earth's natural cycles. Having been released into the Arc of the Covenant portal bridge in 9558 BC, the Sphere of Amenti would intercept Earth sometime in 7558 BC. It would not arrive in time for the dimensional blend period of 9048 BC, and would arrive before the next dimensional blend period in 6835 BC. If the Sphere of Amenti attempted to enter Earth's three-dimensional body during a time period when Earth's fourth-dimensional vortices were not opened, the Sphere would explode upon impact with the natural frequency barrier that separates the third and fourth dimensions.
